Class TableBuilder

java.lang.Object
pt.up.fe.els2024.builders.Builder
pt.up.fe.els2024.builders.TableBuilder
public class TableBuilder extends Builder
The TableBuilder class provides a builder pattern for constructing, configuring, and exporting tables in various formats. It supports setting table properties and exporting the table to specified file formats.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TableBuilder()
    Constructs a new TableBuilder with an empty Table instance.

    • performOperation

      public OperationBuilder performOperation(String operationName)
      Initiates an OperationBuilder to perform operations on the table.
      Parameters:
      operationName - the name of the operation to perform
      Returns:
      a new OperationBuilder instance for the specified operation

    • assemble

      public Table assemble(String outputFilePath) throws IOException, ExportException
      Assembles and exports the table to a specified file path, supporting CSV, HTML, JSON, and XML formats.
      Parameters:
      outputFilePath - the file path to export the table to
      Returns:
      the assembled Table instance
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during export
      ExportException - if the file extension is unsupported
